entries.journal_entry_description: Now that the Kerritamba people are up in arms, Dahlia Damask has determined that its the perfect time to strike at the heart of the Kerritamba people. Warchief Naloriss has proven himself the hero in hard times. It is your task to make sure he falls and that the Kerritamba people suffer as a result.
entries.journal_entry_title: The Road to Exemplar: Warchief Naloriss
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Defeat Warchief Naloriss and return to Dahlia Damask.
